title: Verify 'Clear to Close'
description: The closing date is approaching. The agent needs to confirm with the buyer's lender that the loan is fully approved and ready to fund.

tasks.description: Identify the transaction and the contact information for the buyer's loan officer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the correct lender contact info.

tasks.description: Contact the loan officer to request confirmation of the 'Clear to Close' status.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a clear request to the lender.

tasks.description: Receive confirmation from the lender and notify all parties (seller's agent, escrow) that the loan is ready.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives the confirmation and disseminates the information to the relevant parties.
